name: Streaming Mobile App Screen
description:
Hey mate! 👋


What’s popping? I know it’s hardly possible to have enough of inspiring content. Indulge yourself with another one work.


Meet the Streaming App concept! This is a comprehensive player application that helps users to find the best music and podcasts. Easy navigation, translucent textures, gradients, and the light effect are the icing on a cake.


Your appreciation means a lot, you know it. Press ❤️ to support us and share your feedback on comments.


We are open to work and your ideas 🚀


DM us or get in touch via hello@spaceberry.studio


Explore more projects of ours on Behance, Dribbble and our website 

 

Meet the team on Instagram 


Cheers!
